title: [LFM] SILVER DUO BOT LOOKING FOR MID, JG, AND TOP FOR RANKED 5s :)
body:
My friend (ins41n3) and I (PRLDE) follow the competitive scene extremely closely and are ALWAYS talking to each other about LCK, LPL, NALCS and EULCS games that we've watched recently while waiting for Ranked games. We love laughing about the threads on /r/leagueoflegends while trying to help each other climb into Gold. 

Since we enjoy the Challenger and Champions scene so much in other regions, we've always been interested in starting our own team and wondering what it would be like to coordinate lane swaps, early tower dives, setting up vision control, and rotations through Skype or TeamSpeak with 3 others who enjoy the game as much as we do!

Both of us are smart kids, 22 years old, and easy to play with. If the above sounds like you as well, and you love playing Mid, Jungle, or Top -- and you're anywhere from Bronze I to Silver I -- and looking to learn and climb with some new friends, then please feel free to add us on the client next time you're on so we can get to know you better! 

^_^

If posting here is more convenient for you, go ahead and leave your name and I'll add you next time I'm on. :)

One thing we want to make clear though, and something we've had a problem with in normal 5s is Shot-calling. Ins41n3 and I have a very clear idea of how we want to play the game because of how much time we spend watching the game at a high level. We really want some outside perspective and some friends we can bounce ideas off of but we're confident in our knowledge of the game and we're not looking for any type of leader. We are the respective Uzi and Mata of our roles (lol) and we work well together because of it. We may not be the greatest with our hands but we're Challenger in the head and the heart! 

We just need a PawN, Huni, and Rush to make this as fun as possible. 

xD

TL;DR - Looking for a (Bronze I to Silver I) Mid, Jungle, and Top for a new Ranked 5s team who is mature, calm, and ready to enjoy the way this game is meant to be played. :)

replies.body: Am Mata can confirm I bathe in the {{item:3070}}  of my nemesise
i play Main MId if you want to just add me up GBG727
hey buddy im keen I main jg but can top and sup too other areas not great at yet. I will add u

lf team or competent duo's for normals or ranked.
happy to play any role.
ign : affektz

Hey Mate,
Keen to get in a couple of games with you guys. add me in game: span
cheers.
btw i follow the NA and EU lcs, and watch all stars, MSI champs and worlds when they are on so i have a good understanding of world stage strategies.
Hey man i can play top lane as well as mid if need be, im 18 and play regularly.  IGN:: the oce thresh
i Main jg and i love watching all the regions can i please join your rank team IGN: Darryl0127

Can't wait to play! :)

Other Junglers don't be discouraged that you weren't the first. If it doesn't work out with Aerlion, I'd still like to hear from you. :) 

...and don't worry; anyone who messages me after we've thought we've secured a position, I'll forward you to any others that messaged me so you guys can try and organize your own team. :)

A young mid-laner has just messaged me with the concern that he might make us uncomfortable because he's only 14.

First, I'd like to apologize if I made it seem like we're only looking for kids our age. I know a lot of kids older than me who act like toddlers and a lot of kids younger than me who are super chill! 

I applaud this kid for having the guts to still message me. Neither of us care whether you're 14 or 75, okay? Age has nothing to do with it.

^_^
